alert.note: Alert for Chenango; Delaware; Otsego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued February 19 at 11:28AM EST until February 19 at 12:30PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Snow Squall Warning for... Otsego County in central New York... North central Delaware County in central New York... East central Chenango County in central New York... * Until 1230 PM EST. * At 1128 AM EST, a dangerous snow squall was located along a line extending from near Springfield to near Guilford, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Whiteout conditions. Zero visibility in heavy snow and blowing snow. Wind gusts greater than 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. Locations impacted include... Oneonta, Davenport, Worcester, Middlefield, Hartwick, Maryland, Cooperstown, Westville, Springfield and Burlington. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 88 between 13 and 19. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Reduce your speed and turn on headlights! During snow squalls, the visibility may suddenly drop to near zero in whiteout conditions.
